tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE glacier_movement (
    glacier_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    glacier_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    movement_type VARCHAR(50),
    movement_distance FLOAT,
    movement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE glacier_statistics (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    glacier_id INT,
    stat_date DATE,
    stat_type VARCHAR,
    stat_value DECIMAL
);
